DOC.brief_summary: This pilot trial study well mobile health ( mHealth ) human papillomavirus ( HPV ) vaccine intervention work increase HPV vaccine coverage among young adult gay bisexual men . Giving young men information HPV vaccine importance vaccination may encourage get HPV vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Mobile Health Intervention Increasing HPV Vaccine Coverage Among Young Adult Gay Bisexual Men
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Pilot test mobile health ( mHealth ) HPV vaccine intervention young gay bisexual men establish feasibility acceptability . II . Obtain preliminary efficacy data whether mHealth HPV vaccine intervention increase HPV vaccine initiation compare control group . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . Examine whether mHealth HPV vaccine intervention affect secondary outcome compare control group . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 group . GROUP I ( CONTROL ) : Patients receive standard information HPV HPV vaccine , vaccine information statement ( VIS ) , mobile-friendly website study portal . GROUP II ( INTERVENTION ) : Patients receive mHealth HPV vaccine intervention consist content HPV HPV vaccine study portal 15 minute vaccination reminder send portal via text e-mail . All patient complete survey study portal baseline , immediately mHealth intervention control material , 3 month 7 month thereafter 10-15 minute .
DOC.criteria: Selfidentifies gay bisexual Lives United States ( US ) Has receive dos HPV vaccine
